Title: Splice
Writer: Vincenzo Natali (screenplay), Antoinette Terry Bryant (screenplay), Doug Taylor (screenplay), Vincenzo Natali (story), Antoinette Terry Bryant (story)
Actors: Adrien Brody, Sarah Polley, Delphine Chanéac, Brandon McGibbon
Plot: Genetic engineers Clive Nicoli and Elsa Kast hope to achieve fame by successfully splicing together the DNA of different animals to create new hybrid animals for medical use.
